title: SRI LANKA’S FORMER POLICE CHIEF TO TEACH COUNTER TERRORISM IN INDIA
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Dr. Mahinda Balasuriya, Sri Lanka’s former police chief will be teaching counter terrorism and how Sri Lanka defeated the 30 year terror reign of the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) at his alma mater in Vadodara ( formerly Baroda) in the Indian state of Gujarat….
